statements: UPDATE song_records SET song_title = 'New Song Title', artist_name = 'New Artist Name' WHERE song_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE song_records SET song_title = 'Shape of You', music_scores = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
UPDATE Songs SET artist='Adele', music_score='Sheet Music' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Users SET username='JohnSmith', email='john.smith@example.com' WHERE user_id=123;

UPDATE albums SET genre='Rock', release_date='2022-03-15' WHERE album_id=2;

UPDATE Lyrics SET lyrics_text = 'New lyrics text' WHERE song_id = 1 AND verse_number = 2;
